Sentencas: All diesel-only trains in the UK will be phased out by 2040.
Titulo: Particle swarm optimization for a hybrid freight train powered by hydrogen or ammonia solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Hydrogen and ammonia emerge as alternative zerocarbon fuel for greener railway.
Titulo: Particle swarm optimization for a hybrid freight train powered by hydrogen or ammonia solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) provide an alternative prime mover option, which efficiently convert zero-carbon fuels into electricity without emitting nitrogen oxides (NOx), unlike traditional engines.
Titulo: Particle swarm optimization for a hybrid freight train powered by hydrogen or ammonia solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Superior to Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells (PEMFCs) in efficiency, SOFCs fulfil MW-scale power needs and can use ammonia directly.
Titulo: Particle swarm optimization for a hybrid freight train powered by hydrogen or ammonia solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This study investigates innovative strategies for integrating SOFCs into hybrid rail powertrains using hydrogen or ammonia.
Titulo: Particle swarm optimization for a hybrid freight train powered by hydrogen or ammonia solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Utilizing an optimization framework incorporating Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), the study aims to minimize operational costs while considering capital and replacement expenditures, powertrain performance, and component sizing.
Titulo: Particle swarm optimization for a hybrid freight train powered by hydrogen or ammonia solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The findings suggest that hybrid powertrains based on ammonia-fueled SOFCs may potentially reduce costs by 30% compared to their hydrogen counterparts, albeit requiring additional space for engine compartments.
Titulo: Particle swarm optimization for a hybrid freight train powered by hydrogen or ammonia solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Ammonia-fueled SOFCs trains also exhibit a 5% higher efficiency at End-of-Life (EoL), showing less performance degradation than those powered by hydrogen.
Titulo: Particle swarm optimization for a hybrid freight train powered by hydrogen or ammonia solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The State of Charge (SoC) of the batteries in range of 30-70% for both cases is identified as most costeffective.
Titulo: Particle swarm optimization for a hybrid freight train powered by hydrogen or ammonia solid oxide fuel cells
